it.officinerobotiche.serial.frame.motion

Class PID

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.officinerobotiche.serial.frame.AbstractFrame
      • it.officinerobotiche.serial.frame.motion.MotionFrame
        • it.officinerobotiche.serial.frame.motion.PID
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Jmessage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PID.PIDLeft, PID.PIDRight

    public class PID
extends MotionFrame
    Definition to set or get gain PID parameter from board. You can set Kp, proportional gain Ki integral gain, Kd derivative gain.
    Author:
    Raffaello Bonghi

    • Constructor Detail

      • PID

        protected PID(MotionFrame.Command comm)
        Initialize PID message. This Constructor is used for require data from board.
        Parameters:
        comm - Type of command required.

      • PID

        public PID(boolean sync,
   int command,
   byte[] in)
        Initialize message with data received from board. This message is used normally from parser to set data received, it is a message with data.
        Parameters:
        sync - type of packet received (syncronous or not).
        command - type command received.
        in - byte received.

      • PID

        public PID(boolean sync,
   int command,
   Jmessage.Information info)
        Initialize message with ACK, NACK information. This message is used normally from parser.
        Parameters:
        sync - type of packet received (syncronous or not).
        command - type command received.
        info - Information about message.
